channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Robot Wants to Join Your Family (from Tom’s Guide)
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Kuri speaks robot - just beeps and boops. Robot voices aren't quite real enough yet, and we want Kuri's personality to be friendly and consistent all the time. One extra note: via Kuri's bluetooth speakers, she can play audio files including music, ebooks, and podcasts. It's a bit like some of our favorite movie robots: chirps and bleeps are often enough (and more adorable).
